title: [Massive] AI and Art Design Integration: Creative Mathematics Approaches Through Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience Using Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Learners analyze AI-generated art examples, apply mathematical principles, and integrate them into design projects.

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical algorithms (e.g., matrix operations, probability distributions) utilized in AI-generated artworks (GANs, neural style transfer, etc.).
Through case-based learning, learners can produce design prototypes integrating AI tools and mathematical principles.
Learners analyze artistic applications of AI to discuss creativity expansion and ethical issues (copyright, bias, etc.).

resources: AI art generation tools (e.g., DeepArt, Runway ML)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
